title: X Factor: Celebrity sees Jenny Ryan in Safe Chair as fans freak out over return
text:
X Factor: Celebrity sees Jenny Ryan straight in Safe Chair (Picture: ITV)

The Chase star Jenny Ryan made her way back onto the X Factor: Celebrity after being booted off the show last week.

Yes, despite being eliminated, the hopeful returned following an outpour of love for the star and a ‘Justice for Jenny Ryan’ campaign.

And it seems as though she was supposed to make her comeback, as the 37-yer-old impressed the judges so much she was awarded a safe chair.

Singing the Conchita Wurst hit, Rise Like A Phoenix, the quiz mastermind smashed her vocals and secured herself a place in the next round.

After her performance, Nicole Scherzinger gushed: ‘Oh my gosh I don’t even know where to start with that, I am blown away. Right now I am speechless.’

She added: ‘That performance was ruthless and roofless because you just blew the roof off.

Nicole saved her (Picture: ITV)

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Honestly you looked stunning up there. You’re like a sexy vixen and your pipes just soared.

‘This was your moment tonight Jenny, so that’s why I am giving you my safe seat!’

The crowd erupted into cheers, and it seemed as though Jenny was close to tears as she wrapped her arms around the host Dermot O’Leary.

Over on Twitter, fans applauded the star on her success and celebrated her return.

‘Omgggggg I can’t believe they brought back the woman from the chase! Yessss she absolutely deserves it,’ one wrote while another added: ‘Miss Jenny is back with an vengeance.’

Fans freaked out over The Chase star’s return (Picture: ITV)

Someone else wrote: ‘Jenny Ryan performing Rise Like a Phoenix. A MOMENT.’

When it was announced that she would be making her return, the star revealed just how excited she was to be back.

She beamed: ‘I’ve loved every moment of The X Factor and I’m delighted to be able to get the opportunity to perform live.

‘The response from the public has been amazing – what an incredible experience. I’m so pleased it’s continuing!’

Nicole, who is looking after the over 28s, added: ‘Jenny was just brilliant at her audition in LA. That voice of hers is one of a kind, and she’s an amazing person to get to know. So it was such a tough decision to make.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘After a lot of discussions, we all agreed we had to put her through. The Overs are gonna smash it this year!’

The X Factor: Celebrity continues next Saturday on ITV.

description: X Factor: Celebrity sees Jenny Ryan straight in Safe Chair as fans freak out over The Chase star's return.
